mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, STATUS, STATUSNAME, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPERTYPE, STATUSFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, CONTENT, MEMBER, CUSTOMERNAME from db_tasklog where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select SEQUENCEID, SID, STYPE, STYPENAME, OPER, OPERTIME, TOOPER, TOOPERTIME, STATUS, STATUSNAME, SLEVEL, CHECKRESULT, SCORES, CHECKOPER, CHECKTIME, PUBLICFLAG, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, RESERVE4, RESERVE5, ENDTIME, DATEDIFF, CORPID, OPERTYPE, STATUSFLAG, CUSTOMERTYPE, TITLE, QUESTION, ANSWER, CHECKDESCR, CONTENT, MEMBER, CUSTOMERNAME from db_tasklog
mapper.sql: SEQUENCEID , SID , STYPE , STYPENAME , OPER , OPERTIME , TOOPER , TOOPERTIME , STATUS , STATUSNAME , SLEVEL , CHECKRESULT , SCORES , CHECKOPER , CHECKTIME , PUBLICFLAG , RESERVE1 , RESERVE2 , RESERVE3 , RESERVE4 , RESERVE5 , ENDTIME , DATEDIFF , CORPID , OPERTYPE , STATUSFLAG , CUSTOMERTYPE , TITLE , QUESTION , ANSWER , CHECKDESCR , CONTENT , MEMBER , CUSTOMERNAME

SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SID = #{sid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STYPE = #{stype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STYPENAME = #{stypename,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
TOOPER = #{tooper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TOOPERTIME = #{toopertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUSNAME = #{statusname,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SLEVEL = #{slevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKRESULT = #{checkresult,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
SCORES = #{scores,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CHECKOPER = #{checkoper,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CHECKTIME = #{checktime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
PUBLICFLAG = #{publicflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE4 = #{reserve4,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
RESERVE5 = #{reserve5,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
ENDTIME = #{endtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} and
DATEDIFF = #{datediff,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and
CORPID = #{corpid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
OPERTYPE = #{opertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
STATUSFLAG = #{statusflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERTYPE = #{customertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
QUESTION = #{question,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
ANSWER = #{answer,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CHECKDESCR = #{checkdescr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
MEMBER = #{member,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} and
CUSTOMERNAME = #{customername,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}
and 1=1
